extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Dishwasher Mode

attributes.name: SupportedModes
attributes.valueRange: At least one entry must include the Normal mode tag
attributes.description: This attribute contains the list of supported modes that may be selected for the CurrentMode attribute.

attributes.name: CurrentMode
attributes.valueRange: Must match the Mode field of one of the entries in the SupportedModes attribute
attributes.description: This attribute indicates the current mode of the server.

attributes.name: StartUpMode
attributes.valueRange: Must match the Mode field of one of the entries in the SupportedModes attribute
attributes.description: Indicates the desired startup mode for the server when it is supplied with power.

attributes.name: OnMode
attributes.valueRange: Must match the Mode field of one of the entries in the SupportedModes attribute
attributes.description: Indicates whether the value of CurrentMode depends on the state of the On/Off cluster on the same endpoint.

parameters.description: Indicates a valid mode transition within the supported list.

clusters.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster and defines additional mode tags and namespaced enumerated values for dishwasher devices.
